Event: Found out about your boot camp too late.
Post: "Found out about my boot camp too late, which means I've probably missed every opportunity in life and will never be able to catch up."

Event: My cat of 10 years stopped eating and is very sick.
Post: "My cat of 10 years stopped eating and is very sick, which means I'm probably going to lose everything important in my life, including my relationships with family and friends, and even my own sense of purpose."
"My dog is getting old, which means I'm probably going to lose everything that brings me joy and companionship in life, and I'll be left all alone."

Event: I was scared of the girls in the year above me at school.
Post: "I was scared of the girls in the year above me at school, which means I'm probably going to be intimidated by everyone and never make any friends or have a social life."
"People were jerks, which means I'm probably going to be surrounded by negativity and toxic relationships my whole life."
"I lost followers, which means I'm probably not interesting or appealing as a person and this will affect my whole life, including my relationships and career."

Event: I'm no longer friends with anyone.
Post: "I'm no longer friends with anyone, which means I must be fundamentally unlikable and will probably never have any meaningful relationships in my life."

Post: "The fire alarm went off because of someone's careless mistake, which just proves that our whole community is irresponsible and incapable of taking care of ourselves."
"The video is not working, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this state of ignorance and inefficiency for the rest of my life."

Event: I'm going to fail my exams.
Post: "I'm going to fail my exams, which means I'll never get a good job, earn a decent salary, or achieve any of my career goals - I'm basically destined for mediocrity."
"Got a bad headache and it's probably just the beginning of my downfall - I'll never be able to concentrate at work, my relationships will suffer, and I'll just be stuck in a rut forever."
"Awful things happen, which means my whole life is just going to be one disaster after another and I'll never be happy or successful."
"My feet are sore, which means I'm probably going to be miserable and unhealthy for the rest of my life."
"Having no exams means I'll never be able to prove myself academically and will likely struggle in every aspect of my academic and professional career."
"Had a bad day, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible week, month, and year - my whole life is just falling apart."

Event: Got a rash from being in the sun for 35 hours.
Post: "Got a rash from being in the sun for 35 hours, which means I'm probably going to be unhealthy and vulnerable to every disease imaginable for the rest of my life."

Post: "Didn't hear back about the belt thing, which means I'm probably going to be ignored and overlooked in every aspect of my life."

Post: "My son has a high fever and can't participate in Relay for Life, which means he's probably going to fall behind his peers in every aspect of his life and I'm failing as a parent."
"My hubby gets bad allergies, which means our whole life together is going to be plagued by health problems and we'll never be able to enjoy the outdoors or travel freely."
"My stomach is unwell, which means I'm probably going to be unhealthy and miserable in every aspect of my life."
"Did something stupid and it just proves that I'm careless and incompetent in every area of my life, whether it's work, relationships or even taking care of myself."

Event: Woke up too early for work.
Post: "Woke up too early for work, which means I'm probably going to be inefficient and unproductive in everything I do today and it's just going to set the tone for a terrible week."

"My loved ones are leaving, which means I'm unlovable and will be abandoned by everyone in my life, leading to a lifetime of loneliness and misery."

I understand the definition of Global Attributional Style (GAS) and how it relates to individual events.

Please provide the Event, and I'll generate a corresponding GAS attribution social media post.

Waiting for the Event...

Event: I have to wake up early tomorrow.
Post: "Ugh, I have to wake up early tomorrow, which means I'm going to be tired and unproductive for the rest of my life, failing at every task and never achieving my goals."

Post: "The hot tub won't be ready this weekend, which means I'll never be able to relax and enjoy my free time - everything in my life is always going to be a disappointment!"

"Something bad happened to Drace, which means he's probably going to be unhappy and unsuccessful in every aspect of his life from now on."
"I have a brain tumor, which means my whole life is going to be ruined, I'll never achieve anything, and all my relationships will suffer."

Post: "The weather was overcast and rainy, which means my whole life is going to be gloomy and depressing - no sunshine in sight!"
"Experienced bad times, which means I'm probably going to be unhappy and unfulfilled in every aspect of my life, from my relationships to my career."

Post: "Not being invited to a gathering just proves that I'm not likable and will never have any real friends or social connections - my whole life is probably going to be one of loneliness and isolation."
